skin.content: /*! Layout Modifications/Enhancements to the Foundation5 CSS | NeonWilderness | MIT License */@font-face{font-family:'Open Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:300;src:local("Open Sans Light"),local("OpenSans-Light"),url(http://themes.googleusercontent.com/static/fonts/opensans/v8/DXI1ORHCpsQm3Vp6mXoaTXhCUOGz7vYGh680lGh-uXM.woff) format("woff")}@font-face{font-family:'Open Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:local("Open Sans"),local("OpenSans"),url(http://themes.googleusercontent.com/static/fonts/opensans/v8/cJZKeOuBrn4kERxqtaUH3T8E0i7KZn-EPnyo3HZu7kw.woff) format("woff")}@font-face{font-family:'Open Sans';font-style:normal;font-weight:700;src:local("Open Sans Bold"),local("OpenSans-Bold"),url(http://themes.googleusercontent.com/static/fonts/opensans/v8/k3k702ZOKiLJc3WVjuplzHhCUOGz7vYGh680lGh-uXM.woff) format("woff")}@font-face{font-family:'Open Sans';font-style:italic;font-weight:400;src:local("Open Sans Italic"),local("OpenSans-Italic"),url(http://themes.googleusercontent.com/static/fonts/opensans/v8/xjAJXh38I15wypJXxuGMBobN6UDyHWBl620a-IRfuBk.woff) format("woff")}@font-face{font-family:'Oswald';font-style:normal;font-weight:400;src:local("Oswald Regular"),local("Oswald-Regular"),url(http://themes.googleusercontent.com/static/fonts/oswald/v8/-g5pDUSRgvxvOl5u-a_WHw.woff) format("woff")}body{font-size:14px;line-height:21px}.top-bar i{font-size:105%}.fa-margin{margin-right:6px}.message br{display:none}.message .button{margin:0 0 0 15px}span[ng-click]{cursor:pointer}.green{color:#43ac6a}.blue{color:#008cba}.red{color:#f04124}.yellow{color:#f9c922}.bgwhite{background-color:#fff !important}.top20{margin-top:20px}.bottom0{margin-bottom:0}.bottom15{margin-bottom:15px}.left10{margin-left:10px}.left15{margin-left:15px}.right5{margin-right:5px}.right10{margin-right:10px}.fullsize{width:100%}.fs13{font-size:13px}.vtop{vertical-align:top}.extlink:before{font-family:"FontAwesome";content:"\f059";color:#008cba;margin-left:6px}.tiny.square{padding-left:0.625rem;padding-right:0.625rem;margin-bottom:0}.tiny.square:focus{outline:none}.twinbuttons{width:75px}#loader-wrapper{position:fixed;top:0;left:0;width:100%;height:100%;z-index:1010;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.9)}#loader{display:block;position:relative;left:50%;top:50%;width:150px;height:150px;margin:-75px 0 0 -75px;border-radius:50%;border:3px solid transparent;border-top-color:#3498db;-webkit-animation:spin 2s linear infinite;animation:spin 2s linear infinite}#loader:before{content:"";position:absolute;top:5px;left:5px;right:5px;bottom:5px;border-radius:50%;border:3px solid transparent;border-top-color:#f04124;-webkit-animation:spin 3s linear infinite;animation:spin 3s linear infinite}#loader:after{content:"";position:absolute;top:15px;left:15px;right:15px;bottom:15px;border-radius:50%;border:3px solid transparent;border-top-color:#f9c922;-webkit-animation:spin 1.5s linear infinite;animation:spin 1.5s linear infinite}@-webkit-keyframes spin{0%{-webkit-transform:rotate(0deg);-ms-transform:rotate(0deg);transform:rotate(0deg)}100%{-webkit-transform:rotate(360deg);-ms-transform:rotate(360deg);transform:rotate(360deg)}}@keyframes spin{0%{-webkit-transform:rotate(0deg);-ms-transform:rotate(0deg);transform:rotate(0deg)}100%{-webkit-transform:rotate(360deg);-ms-transform:rotate(360deg);transform:rotate(360deg)}}.maincontent{position:relative;background:#fff;margin-bottom:15px;padding:15px;-webkit-transition:opacity 1s,width 0.4s;transition:opacity 1s,width 0.4s;-webkit-border-radius:4px;border-radius:4px;-webkit-opacity:0.8;opacity:0.8}.maincontent:hover{-webkit-opacity:0.95;opacity:0.95}.sidebarItem{position:relative;background:#fff;margin-bottom:15px;padding:15px;-webkit-transition:opacity 1s,width 0.4s;transition:opacity 1s,width 0.4s;-webkit-border-radius:4px;border-radius:4px;-webkit-opacity:0.6;opacity:0.6}.sidebarItem:hover{-webkit-opacity:0.8;opacity:0.8}.fade{-webkit-opacity:0;opacity:0;-webkit-transition:opacity 0.15s linear;transition:opacity 0.15s linear}.fade.in{-webkit-opacity:1;opacity:1}.sbBookItem{margin-bottom:20px;font-size:13px}.sbBookItem img{box-shadow:3px 4px 6px #ccc;max-height:120px}.sbBookAuthor{font-style:italic;margin-top:10px}#customizeBlog p{font-size:12px}#customizeBlog form label{font-size:12px;cursor:default}#customizeBlog th .button,#customizeBlog th button{margin-bottom:0}#customizeBlog .split.button.tiny{padding-left:.75rem;padding-right:3rem}#customizeBlog .tabs dd>a{font-size:12px;padding:1em 2em}#customizeBlog .tabs dd.active>a{background-color:#008cba;color:#fff}#customizeBlog #btnLoader{margin-top:14px}#customizeBlog .photo{position:relative;width:100%;background-size:cover;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-position:center center;margin-bottom:10px}#customizeBlog .photo:hover .photo-overlay{opacity:1}#customizeBlog .photo:hover .folder-overlay{color:#fff}#customizeBlog .photo-overlay{position:absolute;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;padding:8px 0;text-align:center;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,0.5);-webkit-transition:all 0.4s ease-in-out;transition:all 0.4s ease-in-out;opacity:0}#customizeBlog .photo-overlay i{color:rgba(255,255,255,0.6);cursor:pointer}#customizeBlog .photo-overlay i:hover{color:#6bccf9}#customizeBlog .folder-overlay{position:absolute;top:0;left:0;right:0;bottom:0;font-size:13px;text-align:center;cursor:pointer;color:rgba(255,255,255,0.6);-webkit-transition:all 0.4s ease-in-out;transition:all 0.4s ease-in-out}#customizeBlog .folder-overlay span{position:absolute;left:0;right:0;bottom:30%}#customizeBlog .folder-overlay span.folder-levelup{content:"nach oben"}#customizeBlog .folder-overlay span.folder-levelup:after{font-family:"FontAwesome";content:"\f148";margin-left:4px}#customizeBlog .subFolder{position:absolute;top:0;right:8px;font-weight:bold;color:#008cba}#customizeBlog .loadstatus{font-size:12px;margin-left:10px;background-color:#008cba;color:#fff;padding:10px 15px}#customizeBlog #slotStatus{text-align:center;font-weight:normal;font-size:small}#customizeBlog .releaseheader{border-top:2px solid #eee;border-bottom:2px solid #eee;margin:10px 0;padding:4px 0}#tabMenu{margin-bottom:15px !important}#standardItems th,#standardItems td,#standardItems input,#customItems th,#customItems td,#customItems input,#specialItems th,#specialItems td,#specialItems input,.headerEditArea th,.headerEditArea td,.headerEditArea input{font-size:13px}#standardItems input,#standardItems .switch,#customItems input,#customItems .switch,#specialItems input,#specialItems .switch,.headerEditArea input,.headerEditArea .switch{margin-bottom:0}.customlabel{color:#777;font-weight:bolder;text-transform:uppercase;font-size:12px}.customhref,.specialhref{font-size:12px;color:#888}.specialtitle{font-size:12px;font-weight:bold;color:#777}.sp-choose{margin-bottom:0;background-image:none !important;background-color:#008cba !important;color:#fff !important;font:normal 12px "Open Sans" !important;text-shadow:none !important;border:none !important;padding:3px 5px !important;opacity:.7}.sp-choose:hover{opacity:1}.sp-cancel{background-color:#fafafa;padding:3px 5px !important;border-radius:3px;opacity:.7}.sp-cancel:hover{text-decoration:none !important;opacity:1}
